head.title: Chris B. on Untappd

meta.name: description
meta.content: Chris B. Check-in Activity on Untappd with beer ratings, venues and more.

meta.name: robots
DC.subject
meta.content: Chris B. Check-in Activity on Untappd with beer ratings, venues and more.

link.title: no title

input.placeholder: Find a beer, brewery or bar...
input.name: q

input.style: position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 0; width: 1px; height: 1px; visibility: hidden;

input.placeholder: Find a beer, brewery or bar...
input.name: q

input.style: position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; z-index: 0; width: 1px; height: 1px; visibility: hidden;

img.alt: Oskar Blues Brewery by Mama's Little Yella Pils

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Mama's Little Yella Pils by Oskar Blues Brewery at Dot's Hop House

img.alt: Lakewood Brewing Company by The Temptress

div.p: Chris B. is drinking The Temptress by Lakewood Brewing Company at The People's Last Stand

img.alt: Brash Brewing Company by Projekt Mayhem

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Projekt Mayhem by Brash Brewing Company

img.span: Earned the Middle of the Road (Level 12) badge!

img.alt: Saint Arnold Brewing Company by Not A Collaboration

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Not A Collaboration by Saint Arnold Brewing Company

img.alt: Firestone Walker Brewing Company by Leo v. Ursus: Fortem

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Leo v. Ursus: Fortem by Firestone Walker Brewing Company

img.alt: Lakewood Brewing Company by Tennessee Temptress

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Tennessee Temptress by Lakewood Brewing Company at HERE Sushi Bar

img.span: Earned the So Udderly Sweet (Level 2) badge!

img.alt: Red Gap Brewing by Big Chief's Bock

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Big Chief's Bock by Red Gap Brewing at HERE Sushi Bar
Chris B. is drinking a Citrus Jammer by Sixpoint Brewery at HERE Sushi Bar

img.alt: Buffalo Bayou Brewing by Summer's Wit

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Summer's Wit by Buffalo Bayou Brewing at HERE Sushi Bar

img.alt: Lazy Magnolia Brewing Company by Southern Pecan

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Southern Pecan by Lazy Magnolia Brewing Company at HERE Sushi Bar

img.alt: Shannon Brewing Company by Blackberry Crystal Wheat

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Blackberry Crystal Wheat by Shannon Brewing Company

img.span: Earned the Middle of the Road (Level 11) badge!

img.alt: Shannon Brewing Company by Wee Heavy

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Wee Heavy by Shannon Brewing Company

img.alt: Shannon Brewing Company by Bourbon Barrel Aged Honey Porter

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a Bourbon Barrel Aged Honey Porter by Shannon Brewing Company

img.span: Earned the American Craft Beer Week (2018) badge!

img.alt: Ninkasi Brewing Company by N10 Imperial Blended Ale

div.p: Chris B. is drinking a N10 Imperial Blended Ale by Ninkasi Brewing Company at Whitestone Golf Club
Chris B. is drinking an Extra Special Ballenger by BPS

img.span: Earned the Home Brewed Goodness badge!

div.style: padding: 24px; text-align: center; webkit-box-sizing: border-box; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box;
div.p: Warning - Are you sure you want to delete this check-in? This cannot be undone. All badges that are associated with this check-in will be removed.
<a class="track-click" data-track="sidebar" data-href=":userlists/lists" href="/user/Chrisballenger/lists/" ">See All Lists
